title: The Power of Faith
summary: Faith is the cornerstone of spiritual resilience. It empowers individuals to act with hope even in uncertainty.
subpoints: Strengthens our connection to divine purpose.
quotes: "Faith is taking the first step even when you don't see the whole staircase." - Martin Luther King Jr.
"Now faith is confidence in what we hope for and assurance about what we do not see." - Hebrews 11:1

title: Living a Life of Charity
summary: Charity is the pure love of Christ. It is expressed through selfless acts and an enduring heart.
subpoints: Charity suffers long and is kind.
It envieth not and is not puffed up.
quotes: "Charity is the pure love of Christ, and it endureth forever." - Moroni 7:47
